messages:
The permission type the site must one of the following:

- full planning permission
- outline planning permission
- reserved matters approval
- permission in principle
- technical details consent
- planning permission granted under an order
- other

errors.message: 'https://publicaccess.fdean.gov.uk/online-applications/simpleSearchResults.do?action=firstPage   https://publicaccess.fdean.gov.uk/online-applications/simpleSearchResults.do?action=firstPage' is not a url

messages: This column can contain one or more URLs separated by a pipe (‘|’) character

errors.message: This should be 'permissioned, not permissioned, pending decision'

messages:
To indicate what stage of the planning process the site is at one of the following should be used:

- permissioned
- not permissioned
- pending decision

When part of a site is permissioned, it should be recorded as “permissioned” and you should explain in the ‘Notes’ field why it’s only partly permissioned.

For more information see paragraph 5 of [Schedule 2 of the 2017 Regulations](http://www.legislation.gov.uk/uksi/2017/403/schedule/2/made).
